title: Photon
occurrences: For instance, the photon emitted can skip like so.
We miss very dense photon waves called Roentgen waves.
The ice melts and we get a new tide of photon waves.
The backyard is penetrated by photon waves: the lnternet, cellphones, TV, the army.
The surrounding photon waves are bouncing off them.
A photon spurt gushes into the eyes,
the photon wave is bigger than the image
Every single photon starts to count.
The old Sun and its surroundings have long died out, sucked out of any photon remains.
